page.title: 17COMMUNITY POLICEMAN
page.content: The community policemans first job is to{protect people. His second main job is to{protect {property and equipment. His other jobs after that are capturing criminals etc. Turning to the uniform and weapons his first weapon is the truncheon whose original name is the{staff.The warrant was kept in the staff,which was hollow,but is now kept in a plastic wallet.Another piece of{equipment is the radio which is fixed into the car or the men carry them around.The radio has only been used for the last 15 to {20 years. The fashion may change but the basic job never changes. Some of the other jobs are to visit schools.To join the{police force you have to be a certain age and height you need certain exams as well.
